ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: How often have people treated you in the following ways at any time in the past because of your alcohol and/or drug use history? Family members have thought that I cannot be trusted
How often have people treated you in the following ways at any time in the past because of your alcohol and/or drug use history? Family members have looked down on me
How often have people treated you in the following ways at any time in the past because of your alcohol and/or drug use history? Family members have treated me differently
How often have people treated you in the following ways at any time in the past because of your alcohol and/or drug use history? Healthcare workers have not listened to my concerns

How often have people treated you in the following ways at any time in the past because of your alcohol and/or drug use history? Healthcare workers have thought that I'm ''pill shopping,'' or trying to con them into giving me prescription medications to get high or sell
How often have people treated you in the following ways at any time in the past because of your alcohol and/or drug use history? Healthcare workers have given me poor care
How likely is it that people will treat you in the following ways in the future because of your alcohol and/or drug use history? Family members will think that I cannot be trusted
How likely is it that people will treat you in the following ways in the future because of your alcohol and/or drug use history? Family members will look down on me
How likely is it that people will treat you in the following ways in the future because of your alcohol and/or drug use history? Family members will treat me differently
